column2: "Babilɔnhen Belsazar n'afe a odzi kan mu no
column3: Daniel soo daa na ohun enyido adzehu wɔ ne mpa do: nna ɔkyerɛɛw adaaso no na osii nsɛm no tam kae."

column2: "Daniel kaa dɛ
column3: Muhunii wɔ m'enyido adzehu mu anadwe
column4: na
column6: ɔsor mframa anan no tui bɔɔ po kɛse no do."

column2: "Na mbowa akɛse anan fi po no mu puei
column3: ɔsor kor biara."

column2: "Dza odzi kan no tse dɛ gyata
column3: na ɔwɔ ɔkɔr ntsaban: mohwɛe araa ma okodur dɛ wotutuu n'atsaban
column4: na wɔmaa no do fii asaase do
column5: na wɔmaa ogyinaa anan ebien do dɛ nyimpa

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: abowa bi so a otsia ebien a ɔtse dɛ osisi
column4: na ogyinae tɔree kɔr fakor
column5: na mparba ebiasa hyɛ n'anomu wɔ ne se ntamu: na ndze bi see no dɛ

column2: "Iyi ekyir no muhun fofor so a ɔtse dɛ ɔsebɔ a nnoma ntsaban anan sisi n'ekyir; abowa no wɔ etsir anan so; na wɔdze tumdzi maa no."
"Iyi ekyir no muhunii wɔ anadwe enyido adzehu mu bio
column3: na hwɛ
column4: abowa a otsia anan a no ho yɛ hu
column6: yɛ dzen mbordo; na ɔwɔ dadze se akɛse: na ɔmemenee kekaaw mu esinesin
column7: na ɔdze n'anan tsiatsiaa nkaa no do: na ɔsor ɔno na mbowa a wodzii n'enyim kan no nyina; na ɔwɔ mmbɛn du."

column2: "Morodwendwen mmbɛn no ho no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ambɛn kakraba fofor bi so puei wɔ hɔn ntamu
column5: na mmbɛn a wodzii kan no mu ebiasa ase tutui wɔ n'enyim: na
column7: enyiwa a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa enyiwa na ano a ɔkeka nsɛm akɛse wɔ ambɛn no ho."

column2: "Mohwɛe araa kesii dɛ wɔdze ahengua sisii hɔ
column3: na nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi mbersantsen bɛtsenaa do: n'atar hoa dɛ esukwankyɛba
column4: na ne tsir do nhwi tse dɛ oguannhwi fitafita; n'ahengua ogyaframee a

column2: "Ogya esutsen fi n'enyim worae bae: mpempem mpempem soom no
column3: na pedu mbɔho pedu gyinagyinaa n'enyim. Wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worubu atsɛn
column4: na wobuebuee nwoma no mu."

column2: "Mohwɛe araa ma okesii dɛ ɔnam nsɛm akɛse a ambɛn no kae ntsi; wokum abowa no
column3: na wɔsɛɛ no honam
column4: na wɔdze no maa ogyaframee."

column2: "Na mbowa nkaa no dze
column3: wɔgyee hɔn tumdzi; naaso wɔhyɛɛ hɔn nda na ber a hɔn nkwa bɔtoa do ekodu."

column2: "Minyaa anadwe enyido adzehu bio
column3: na hwɛ
column4: obi a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa ba dze ɔsor nsuwusiw reba
column5: na ɔbaa nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi mbersantsen no nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔno na wɔmaa no tumdzi
column3: na enyimnyam
column4: na ahendzi
column7: na kasa horow nyina nsom no: no tumdzi yɛ daa tumdzi a orunntwa mu da
column8: na n'ahendzi yɛ dza wɔrennsɛɛ no."

column2: "Emi Daniel dze
column3: mo sunsum bɔmee wɔ mo honam mu
column4: na m'enyido adzehu no haaw me."

column2: "Mipinkyɛɛn hɔn a wogyinaa hɔ no mu baako
column3: na mibisaa no dza muhunii no nyina ho asekyerɛ. Nna ɔkaa kyerɛɛ me
column4: na ɔmaa muhun ndzɛmba no ne nkyerɛase."

column2: "Mbowa akɛse a wɔyɛ anan yi
column3: wɔyɛ ahemfo baanan a wobefi asaase do asoɛr."

column2: "Na Ɔsorsornyi no n'ahotseweefo no dze
column3: wɔbɛgye ahendzi no
column4: na woenya ahendzi no daa

column2: "Nna mohwehwɛɛ dɛ muhu nokwar no wɔ abowa a otsia anan a ɔsor ɔno na hɔn nyina no a no ho yɛ hu mbordo a ne se yɛ dadze
column3: na n'awerɛw yɛ boran a ɔmemenee ɔkekaaw mu esinesin na ɔdze n'anan tsiatsiaa nkaa no do no ho no nkyerɛase;"

column2: "na ne tsir do mmbɛn du no
column3: na ambɛn fofor bi so a opuei na ebiasa tutui wɔ n'enyim; ambɛn no a ɔwɔ enyiwa
column4: na ano a ɔkaa nsɛm akɛse
column5: na ehwɛ a ɔso sen ne mfɛfo no ho dze;"

column2: "mohwɛe
column3: na ambɛn kor no ara nye ahotseweefo no dzii ako
column4: na odzii hɔn do nyim;"

column2: "dze kesii dɛ nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi mbersantsen no bae
column3: na wɔdze abemdzi maa Ɔsorsornyi no n'ahotseweefo no; na ber baa dɛ ahotseweefo no nyaa ahendzi no."

column2: "Ɔkaa dɛm dɛ
column3: Abowa a otsia anan no bɛyɛ ahendzi a otsia anan wɔ asaase do a ɔbɔsor ɔno wɔ ahendzi nyina mu
column4: na ɔamen asaase nyina

column2: "Na mmbɛn du no ho dze
column3: ahendzi kor yi ara mu na ahemfo du bɔsoɛr: na hɔn ekyir no fofor bi bɔsoɛr; na ɔbɔsor ɔno na hɔn a wodzi kan no
column4: na ɔbɛbrɛ ahemfo ebiasa adze."

column2: "Na ɔbɛka nsɛm etsia Ɔsorsornyi no na ɔama Ɔsorsornyi no n'ahotseweefo no aberɛ: na ɔbɔdwen dɛ ɔbɛsakyer mber na mbra; na wɔdze hɔn bɛhyɛ ne nsa ma ekodu mfe ebiasa na fa."
"Na wɔbɛtsena ase ebu atsɛn
column3: na wɔbɛgye ne nsamu tumdzi no
column4: na wɔasɛɛ no dze pasaa."

column2: "Na ahendzi
column3: na tumdzi
column4: na ahenman a wɔwɔ wiadze nyina n'akɛseyɛ wɔdze bɛma Ɔsorsornyi no n'ahotseweefo man no: n'ahendzi yɛ daa ahendzi
column5: na tumdzi nyina bɔsom no ayɛ setsie ama no."

column2: "Ha na asɛm no n'ase si. Emi Daniel dze
column3: m'adwen haaw me pii
column4: na m'enyim sakyeree: na medze asɛm no siee m'akoma mu."
